title: State power under Articles of Confederation

content.prompt: Which of the following does the author use to support his argument about the power of the states under the Confederation?

choices.label: Foundational political documents written during the American Revolution
Journals written by leaders of the Continental Army
Arguments eventually published as The Federalist papers
Treaties signed with Great Britain and France

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
